m_szDocTitle: Meetings with Chinese President Xi Jinping in United States bring agreement on tech firms - CBS News
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- CBS News CBS/AP September 22, 2015, 8:26 PM Meetings with Chinese leader bring agreement on tech firms Chinese President Xi Jinping and First Lady Peng Liyuan arrive at Paine Field in Everett, Washington, September 22, 2015. REUTERS/David Ryder Email SEATTLE - Leaders from Michigan to Beijing attended meetings Tuesday with Chinese President Xi Jinping in the U.S. and signed an agreement aimed at pushing cooperation on the use of clean tech businesses to combat climate change. The meetings with governors from five U.S. states and local Chinese officials came on
